ldlm_interval_tree Struct Reference
[Lustre Distributed Lock Manager]

int lit_size

struct interval_node * lit_root

Detailed Description

Interval tree for extent locks.

The interval tree must be accessed under the resource lock. Interval trees are used for granted extent locks to speed up conflicts lookup. See ldlm/interval_tree.c for more details.
